cu.explanation_en: Setting the MCC to an invalid value of 999 will cause PLMN configuration errors and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of downlink slots to 20 will cause invalid TDD configuration and cell setup failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行時隙數設定為 20 會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成小區設置失敗。
